theLastLightMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theLastLightMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theLastLightMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theLastLightMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theLastLightMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theLastLightMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theLastLightMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theLastLightMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theLastLightMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theLastLightMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theLastLightMod:PoisonStrike.NAME: Poison Strike
theLastLightMod:PoisonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! Poison to an enemy.

theLastLightMod:WitheringStrikeGreen.NAME: Withering Strike
theLastLightMod:WitheringStrikeGreen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! thelastlightmod:Wither.

theLastLightMod:SappingWinds.NAME: SappingWinds
theLastLightMod:SappingWinds.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! thelastlightmod:Wither to ALL enemies.

theLastLightMod:Drain.NAME: Drain
theLastLightMod:Drain.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to enemy's thelastlightmod:Wither, then heal for damage dealt. NL Exhaust. NL

theLastLightMod:CreepingDread.NAME: Creeping Dread
theLastLightMod:CreepingDread.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! thelastlightmod:Wither to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

theLastLightMod:DecayingPunch.NAME: Decaying Punch
theLastLightMod:DecayingPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! thelastlightmod:Wither.

theLastLightMod:Corrosion.NAME: Corrosion
theLastLightMod:Corrosion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of their turn, enemies lose HP equal to their thelastlightmod:Wither stacks.

theLastLightMod:Atrophy.NAME: Atrophy
theLastLightMod:Atrophy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thelastlightmod:Wither. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their thelastlightmod:Wither stacks.

theLastLightMod:CursedBlades.NAME: Cursed Blades
theLastLightMod:CursedBlades.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shivs into your hand. NL Apply !theLastLightMod:SecondMagic! thelastlightmod:Wither to ALL enemies.

theLastLightMod:DeathTouched.NAME: Death Touched
theLastLightMod:DeathTouched.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! thelastlightmod:Wither.

theLastLightMod:Remnants.NAME: Remnants
theLastLightMod:Remnants.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and thelastlightmod:Wither. NL Discard 1 Card.
